ygData.subject: Re: Level making
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s possible you have a pre-existing level 99 in your directory (what happens when you try to load it with the editor?) .. try naming it something like
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 29
Message-ID: <17248.29.94.959279670@...>
Date: Sun, 11 Apr 1999 22:43:24 -0400
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Re: Level making


>I've had this problem for a while.  When I make levels, I cannot run
>them.  I save the level's grid and scen as 99, title as 99 (For level
>99).  The names are all 99.   Then, when I try to run it, it gives me a
>weird version of level 1.  How should I be saving/running the level?

It's possible you have a pre-existing level 99 in your directory (what 
happens when you try to load it with the editor?) .. try naming it 
something like 154 (or other random number below 500) and see if that gives 
you any better results.

--Tom
